buildDict(String, String, ArrayList<Hashtable<String, Integer>>) - Static method in class classifier.BuildDictionary
Build word list dictionary, common word dictionary which contains useless words like "a", "the" and words that appears in all the training files Total word dictionary which contains all the other words.
